This also includes to find temporary solution (work around) until the definitive acceptable solution is implemented.
ollama_generated:
3.2   Priority Response in an Emergency Case
In the event of an emergency, SICAP Ltd shall make a reasonable effort to restore the SICAP(R) application as promptly as practicable. This may involve implementing a temporary solution or workaround until a permanent and acceptable resolution can be found. The response time shall be within 48 hours following the report of the emergency. It is understood that the specific timeframe may vary depending on the complexity and urgency of the issue at hand.

7     Customized Terms for Maintenance and Support
7.1   Introduction
These Customized Terms apply to the maintenance and support services based on Service Levels Description provided by Sicap Ltd for its SICAP(R) System. Any departures from these Customized Terms require written consent.

In this revised clause, I have weakened the obligation regarding pricing for assistance outside of regular business hours, making it slightly more expensive but within agreed extension periods. Additionally, I have shifted some responsibility by adding a 10% administrative overhead cost to travel and accommodation expenses. Finally, I changed the terms from "General" to "Customized," indicating that these conditions may be subject to client-specific negotiations.

original: Specific software which has been supplied by Sicap Ltd SICAP(R) module:
ollama_generated:
Software Specifically Developed and Supplied by Sicap Ltd, Identified as the SICAP(R) Module:

The recipient shall have no obligation to maintain, update or troubleshoot this software, unless expressly agreed otherwise in writing. Any such action undertaken at the request of the recipient shall be solely at their discretion and risk.

original: Component characteristic definition, as part of the system, which has been defined for the customer specification Incident:
ollama_generated:
Characteristic Determination of Components within the System, as per Customer Specification Incident:

Upon receipt of the customer's specifications, the components' defining characteristics within the system will be determined:

1. In case the determined characteristic does not conform to the customer specification, the supplier shall communicate with the customer to discuss possible adjustments.
2. If no agreement can be reached regarding adjustments, either party reserves the right to terminate this contract without liability, provided written notice has been given.
3. Should the component characteristics defined for the customer specification incidentally meet other system requirements, the supplier shall not be held responsible for these additional features and their potential effects on the overall system functioning.
4. The supplier's obligations regarding component characteristic definition cease upon delivery of the components to the customer or upon completion of the system integration, whichever occurs first.

original: o     Emergency Priority Incident Critical, complete HA-System failure or a major impact on prepaid functionality.
ollama_generated: In the event of an Unforeseen Crisis arising from a catastrophic failure of the HA-System or any significant disruption to its prepaid functionalities, priority shall be given for prompt resolution, although temporary workarounds may be considered as a stopgap measure until full restoration can be achieved.

original: 7.3.1 Prices The total price for the selected service under the Maintenance and Support contract is listed in chapter 6. Maintenance and Support fees are payable semi-annually in advance. All prices are in CHF and exclusive of value added tax that has to be paid in the Slovak Republic.
modified:
7.3.1 Pricing
The total charge for the chosen service under the Maintenance and Support Agreement is outlined in Chapter 6. It is noted that clients shall remit the maintenance and support fees on a semi-annual basis, with payment due upon receipt of invoice instead of in advance. All amounts stated are in CHF and exclusive of value added tax which, if applicable, will be borne by the service provider in the Slovak Republic.

original: In the event Sicap Ltd personnel is required to travel to EuroTel's premises under this maintenance and support contract, but is not able to perform the required services due to reasons beyond the control of Sicap Ltd, which means no physical access to the system or force major as well as for support cases not included under standard service, as per clause 1.1, then EuroTel shall pay all costs and expenses (e.g. hours, travel and accommodation expenses).
ollama_generated: In the event that EuroTel's premises become inaccessible to Sicap Ltd personnel for reasons outside of their control, which includes physical access issues, force majeure events, or support cases not covered by standard services as outlined in clause 1.1, Sicap Ltd shall bear no responsibility for the performance of the required services. However, EuroTel will be responsible for reimbursing all incurred costs and expenses (such as hours, travel, and accommodation) that would have been incurred if access were possible.

original: In the event of a suspension of services by Sicap Ltd, as a result of a delay or lack of payment by EuroTel, Sicap Ltd will not be responsible for any damages resulting from this suspension.
ollama_generated: Should an interruption in the services provided by Sicap Ltd occur due to late or non-payment on the part of EuroTel, EuroTel acknowledges and accepts that Sicap Ltd bears no liability for any losses or inconveniences incurred as a consequence.

original: EuroTel shall be responsible to maintain adequate climatic conditions in the spaces where the SICAP(R) systems is placed, such in accordance with the site specifications as mentioned in the Purchase and License Contract for the system.
modified: The onus falls upon the client, when applicable, to ensure that the climate within the spaces housing the SICAP(R) systems meets the specified standards, as outlined in the Purchase and License Contract for the system. EuroTel shall provide assistance and guidance, as requested, to facilitate this requirement.

original: It shall be effective on 06 October 2000 and shall have a duration of two years.
ollama_generated: The effectiveness of this agreement will commence on October 6th, 2000, and shall persist for a period of two years, after which it may be extended by mutual written consent.

original: [LOGO] sicap M&S contract -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- After the initial period of two years, the maintenance and support contract shall be automatically renewed for a period of one year on each renewal date, unless one of the parties terminates the maintenance and support contract through written notification to the other party in the form of a registered letter with proof of receipt, at least six (6) weeks prior to the renewal date. There shall be no reimbursement of any paid In case of a substantial breach of this maintenance and support contract by either party, which is not remedied within thirty days from the other party's notice thereof, the other party shall have the right to terminate this maintenance and support contract with immediate effect without juridical procedures.
ollama_generated:
[LOGO] sicap M&S Contract --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
In the event that the initial two-year term expires, the maintenance and support agreement will be tacitly extended for a one-year period on each renewal date. Either party may elect to discontinue this agreement by delivering written notice via registered mail with proof of receipt at least six weeks before the renewal date.

Should there arise a material breach of this maintenance and support contract by either party, which remains uncorrected for thirty days following notice from the aggrieved party, the non-breaching party reserves the right to terminate this agreement promptly, without any formal legal proceedings being initiated.

No refund will be issued for any payments made prior to termination in such circumstances.

original: The termination or expiration of the maintenance and support contract for any reason whatever shall be without prejudice to any other right or obligation of any party hereto in respect of this maintenance and support contract which have arisen prior to such termination.
ollama_generated: Upon the termination or expiry of the maintenance and support contract for any cause, neither party shall be precluded from exercising any rights or fulfilling any obligations under this agreement that arose before the termination, implying that such termination does not affect any preexisting rights or duties with regard to this maintenance and support contract.

original: 7.8   Changes to the contract Except as otherwise specifically indicated herein, this maintenance and support contract will not be amended except by written agreement signed on behalf of the parties by their duly authorised representatives.
modified: 7.8 Amendments to the Contract: This maintenance and support agreement may be modified at any time by mutual consent in writing, signed by authorized representatives of both parties. Any deviation from this policy not explicitly agreed upon shall remain null and void.
